A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Visually amazing movie\, but an insult to Star Wars lore. Lack of character development\, plot-hole galore\, forced political views replacing actual story\, and mishandling of classic AND new characters plague R. Johnson's movie. Direction is very good (even excellent\, sometimes) but not suited for a Star Wars movie. This movie will probably mark the downfall of a beloved 40 year old franchise
